headline: Capstone Partners Releases 2024 Middle Market Business Owners Research Survey: CEOs Focus on Performance Improvement, Turn to Capital Market Growth in High Interest Rate Environment
summary: Capstone Partners, a leading middle market investment banking firm, released its 2024 Middle Market Business Owners Survey Report, with insights from privately-owned companies across the U.S. This report combines Capstone's in-depth middle market knowledge with proprietary data obtained from 404 participating owners of privately-owned, middle market companies. Conducted between July 31, 2024, and August 26, 2024, the survey captures sentiment at a pivotal moment in the U.S., identifying CEOs' de
